Reviews.Title: Works as claimed
Reviews.Author: Geoff Reed "aka Dr Ted Hebert"
Reviews.Content: Good value! I liked that it included the 12V adapter. Didn't have much use for the tripod, but one of these days, it might come in handy.

ProductInfo.Features:
Package Includes: 1 Halcyon Brand Battery & 1 Halcyon Brand Wall & Car Rapid Charger
Battery Specs: 1400 mAh with Premium Japanese Cells
Memory Card Wallet + USB SDHC Card Reader
Mini Table Top Tripod + Pack of LCD Screen Protectors + Lens/LCD Maintenance Cleaning Kit
(See Description for MORE!)
ProductInfo.Name: Halcyon 1400 mAH Lithium Ion Replacement NP-50 Battery and Charger Kit + Memory Card Wallet + SDHC Card USB Reader + Deluxe Starter Kit for Fujifilm XF1, REAL 3D W3, Finepix F70EXR, F75EXR, F80EXR, F85EXR, F200EXR, F300EXR, F305EXR, F500EXR, F505EXR, F550EXR, F600EXR, F605EXR, F660EXR, F665EXR, F775EXR, F770EXR, F775EXR, F800EXR, XP170, XP150, XP100, X10 Digital Cameras and Fujifilm NP-50
